channel.title: Maven Staging
channel.description: Virtually every youth can create social change

item.title: Maven Member
item.dc:creator: hackers
item.content:encoded: This badge is earned by joining mymaven.org.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Thank you for joining the world of Maven!

item.title: OutLoud Listener
item.dc:creator: hackers
item.content:encoded: Anyone who listens to outLoud Radio can earn this badge!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Thank you for listening to the authentic stories of youth from outLoud Radio!

item.title: OutLoud Producer
item.dc:creator: hackers
item.content:encoded: Youth Producers of outLoud Radio earn this badge by making great radio pieces!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Thank you for producing great radio pieces with outLoud Radio.

item.title: LGBT Center
item.dc:creator: hackers
item.content:encoded: This badge shows support for San Francisco LGBT Center.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Thank you for showing support for San Francisco's LGBT Center!

item.title: LYRIC
item.dc:creator: hackers
item.content:encoded: Lyric Participants can earn this badge.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Thank you for showing your support for LYRIC, the Lavender Youth Recreation and Information Center!

item.title: Profile
item.dc:creator: hackers
item.content:encoded: [filler text]

item.title: freesubmit

item.content:encoded: auto submission tester

item.title: HelloWorld?
item.dc:creator: hackers
item.content:encoded: Inquired about hack for queer youth!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Great! Now go off and learn some programming

item.title: History: Stonewall Riots
item.dc:creator: hackers
item.content:encoded: This badge is earned by reading about the Stonewall Riots and answering all the quiz questions correctly!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Thank you for learning about the Stonewall Riots with us!

item.title: History: The HIV/AIDS Epidemic
item.dc:creator: hackers
item.content:encoded: This badge is earned by reading about the Stonewall Riots and answering all the quiz questions correctly. This is one of the saddest moments in LGBT history, but one that is important to learn about.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Thank you for learning about the HIV/AIDS Epidemic with us! This is one of the saddest moments in LGBT history, but one that is important to learn about.

item.title: H4QY
item.dc:creator: hackers
item.content:encoded: You can earn this badge by participating in Maven's Hack 4 Queer Youth!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Thank you for hacking on behalf of LGBT non-profits!
